Class MemoryGameComponentModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.memorycard.MemoryGameComponentModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class MemoryGameComponentModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    A Swing component for playing the Memory Card Game
    Version:
    CS56 Winter 2018
    Author:
    Bryce McGaw and Jonathan Yau (with some of Phill Conrad's code as a basis), Ryan Halbrook and Yun Suk Chang, Mathew Glodack, Christina Morris, Xiaohe He, Shaoyi Zhang, Hyemin Yoo, Annan Zhang, Shihua Lu
    See Also:

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
        Callback from the timer. This is used to update the time remaining label and to check if the game has ended as a result of the level time running out.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener
